text:
After the Fix for 8650, I've discovered that if a resource being imported via
an absolute URL sends a 302 (redirect) that the redirect is followed.

Additionally, in the case of, say, 410, a FileNotFoundException is returned by
the HttpURLConnection.  In the case of a 100, the status code return by
HttpUrlConnect ion is '-1'
creator: Ryan.Lubke@Sun.COM
